item.title: How To Schedule Recurring Python Scripts in the Cloud With Airplane’s Task-Scheduling
item.description: Python is one of the fastest-growing programming languages of 2021, and it’s no wonder: it’s ease-of-use and versatility makes it a great choice for any sized project. One of its many use-cases are data extraction and ETL processes. A pain point often encountered is the management of recurring Python scripts outside the local system, i.e. cron tasks; I’ve yet to come across a cloud-based solution that makes the deployment and management of Python scripts an easy process.
